Finding A: Indeed, using transcript analysis, the researchers found that, like cancer cells, senescent cells have increased expression of "pro-survival networks" that help them resist apoptosis or programmed cell death.
Finding B: Examples of ASD candidate genes identified by small de novo CNVs include SETD5, DTNA (MIM 6012), and LSAMP (MIM 6032) (Supplemental Data section \'\'Highlighted Genes,\'\' Figures S9, S10, and S14).
Finding C: Well, this is fascinating. Climate control allows us to create temp and moisture conditions we feel most comfortable in. So what climate do most Americans "recreate" in their homes? Western Kenya!
Finding D: Though MC1R dysfunction is clearly linked with defective tanning , MC1R signaling also protects melanocytes against carcinogenesis independent of pigmentation .
